title: Can someone explain auto fill for me?
body: So, i had a believe that when auto fill is active that i had a 1 in 5 chance of getting support, my logic comes from, 5 members, assuming they all also have auto fill active, but that not the case, when ever auto fill is on i always get support, my question now is why?

replies.body:
Basically autofill is active whenever queue times are long. This usually occurs because some roles are more popular than others, so the matchmaking ends up with a shortage of a particular role. It is for this same reason that auto fill usually = support. Support is the least popular role, so is usually what the shortage is, and thus what people get auto filled as most often.

After support is usually jungle > ADC, but the popularity of the other roles varies a lot by patch/season, whereas support pretty much stays as the least popular.

so im guessing that auto fill is kind of like community service and if your in a certain area at a certain time you are put on duty. thats what im thinking because it doesnt seem anybody else got a fill role when i do.

Pretty much, it's unlikely you'd see two autofilled players in one game since it's usually a one role shortage at any given time.

Some people say they'd prefer the queue times, but when the queue times are 20mins~ it's a barrier of entry for a lot of players, so while autofill isn't a perfect solution, it's generally preferable to the alternative (i.e not getting to play at all).
